name: Dungeons Of Kremlin: Remastered
description:
Dungeons Of Kremlin: Remastered is a throwback classic game when you have to explore dark dungeons with hordes
of creatures of russian mythology. Your main quest is to kill the necromancer Ivan Grozniy who revives evil spirits.
Beware of traps and harmful items what can kill you more quickly than enemies. Explore the different locations of
dungeons and find all weapons to use them in final boss fight. This is your way to become a hero who defeated
evil and save the civilians.
